PROJ-101.steps:
Given a registered user with a valid email and password
When the user submits the login form
Then the user is redirected to the dashboard

Given a registered user with a valid email and an invalid password
When the user submits the login form
Then an error message is displayed and no session is created

PROJ-102.summary: Request password reset with registered email
PROJ-102.steps:
Given a registered email address
When the user requests a password reset
Then a reset email is sent to that address

PROJ-201.steps:
Given several test cases with the keyword 'login' in the title
When the QA searches for 'login'
Then all tests containing 'login' in the title are listed

Given test cases tagged as 'regression'
When the QA filters by tag 'regression'
Then only tests with this tag are displayed

PROJ-301.steps:
Given a CSV file with valid test case rows
When the QA uploads the file
Then all rows are imported as test cases without error
